content: Check product availability, if not exist, create order.
pseudo:
BEGIN_CONTEXT
IF Product.Available == FALSE THEN
    Order.Create()
END_IF
END_CONTEXT

END_MESSAGE

content: Check the parking lot; if there are no spaces available, put the person in line.
pseudo:
BEGIN_CONTEXT
IF ParkingLot.Spaces == 0 THEN
    Queue.Add(Person)
END_IF
END_CONTEXT

END_MESSAGE

BEGIN_CONTEXT
IF Entity.Type == Human THEN
    Entity.IsMortal = TRUE
END_IF
END_CONTEXT

END_MESSAGE

content: If it rains, the ground becomes wet.
pseudo:
BEGIN_CONTEXT
IF Weather == Rain THEN
    Ground.State = Wet
END_IF
END_CONTEXT

END_MESSAGE

content: If an employee works more than 40 hours in a week, they receive overtime pay.
pseudo:
BEGIN_CONTEXT
IF Employee.WeeklyHours > 40 THEN
    Employee.Pay += CalculateOvertime(Employee)
END_IF
END_CONTEXT

END_MESSAGE
